overview: The famous Inspector Andreev from the Tomsk Federal Bureau is sent to investigate a terrible murder. Michael Revill, a 95 year old billionaire, was viciously shot. What seems at first to be a simple crime turns into an insane and unpredictable conspiracy. Even someone with as much experience as Andreev could never predict the roots of this terrible plot or the villains' true motives.
title: The Incredible Inspector
